thread.title: Bernadette A Plichta
thread.title_full: LymphedemaProducts.com reviewed by Bernadette A Plichta

author: Bernadette A Plichta
title: Bernadette A Plichta
text:
I just wanted you to know that I received the Juzo 2000 series with silicone band knee highs. I was surprised to receive them so soon. Why I am writing is to let you know that I am thrilled with this product - the fit, the quality, the website, and the overall service.
I have worn them all day today and I am very happy with how they feel.
Since my stem cell transplant in Oct., I developed lymphedema in legs, feet, and toes from the intense chemo. I am now in physical therapy where they recommended these knee highs after they measured me. I will be ordering another pair, probably next month because they are great.
So, I just wanted to Thank You and let you know that I am happy and excited about this product.
I have already spread the word to some of my friends!
